page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content:
The following people were kind enough to provide information and written copy to help in the completion of this project. Mrs Angus (The Manse), Mr & Mrs Fraser (Balnault Farm), Mr Ogilvie (Balmoral Estate), Mrs Birss (Crathie School), Mrs Liddell (Ballater Field Centre), and all the children of P4-7 at Crathie School.
Graeme Fyvie Fiona MacKenzie Callum Muir Carol McDonald Alexander McDonald Yvonne Jaffray William Masson Morag Milne Gavin Fyvie Heather Coutts Euan Fraser Karen Cooke Alasdair MacKenzie Jill Adams Bruce Fraser Laura Taylor Katharine Liddell Nicola Cooke
